data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ili Kazakh, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ili Kazakh, Xinjiang Uygur, China

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Ili Kazakh, Xinjiang Uygur, China find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary: On average, 104 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Ili Kazakh, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ili Kazakh, Xinjiang Uygur, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Ili Kazakh, Xinjiang Uygur, China to the gospel today.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Tuerke people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Tuerke people.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Ili Kazakh, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Ili Kazakh, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 62,206 believers in Ili Kazakh to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
